Package com.PDLB.PPE.API.controller

Class ContractEnergyTypeController

java.lang.Object
com.PDLB.PPE.API.controller.ContractEnergyTypeController
@CrossOrigin(origins="http://localhost:4200", allowCredentials="true", maxAge=3600L) @RestController @RequestMapping(path="api/contractEnergyType") public class ContractEnergyTypeController extends Object
This Controller allow us to use the different path to call specifiy method link to the energy of contract

    • createContractEnergyType

      @PostMapping("/createContractEnergyType") @ResponseStatus(CREATED) public int createContractEnergyType(@RequestBody ContractEnergyTypeDto contractEnergyTypeDto, @RequestParam String contractId)
      Endpoint to create a new contractEnergyType.
      Parameters:
      contractEnergyTypeDto - the contractEnergyType to be created
      contractId - id of the contract
      Returns:
      The id of the new contractEnergyType

    • getAllContractEnergyTypes

      @GetMapping("/getAllContractEnergyTypes") public ArrayList<ContractEnergyTypeDto> getAllContractEnergyTypes()
      Endpoint to get all contractEnergyType.
      Returns:
      a list of all contractEnergyType

    • getContractEnergyTypeById

      @GetMapping("/getContractEnergyTypeById") public ContractEnergyTypeDto getContractEnergyTypeById(@RequestParam int id)
      Endpoint to get a contractEnergyType by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the contractEnergyType to retrieve
      Returns:
      the contractEnergyType with the given ID

    • getContractEnergyTypeByContractId

      @GetMapping("/getContractEnergyTypeByContractId") public ArrayList<ContractEnergyTypeDto> getContractEnergyTypeByContractId(@RequestParam String contractId)
      Endpoint that returns a list of ContractEnergyTypeDto objects based on a given contract ID.
      Parameters:
      contractId - The ID of the contract to retrieve energy types for.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of ContractEnergyTypeDto objects.

    • updateContractEnergyType

      @PutMapping("/updateContractEnergyType") public void updateContractEnergyType(@RequestBody ContractEnergyTypeDto contractEnergyTypeDto)
      Endpoint to update a contractEnergyType.
      Parameters:
      contractEnergyTypeDto - the contractEnergyType to be update

    • deleteContractEnergyTypeById

      @DeleteMapping("/deleteContractEnergyTypeById") public void deleteContractEnergyTypeById(@RequestParam int id)
      Endpoint to delete a contractEnergyType by their ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the contractEnergyType to be deleted
